description:
The shirt from the Answear collection. The model is made of patterned fabric.
      - Free style.
      - Lowered shoulder line.
      - Unfastening sleeves.
      - Fastens on buttons.
      - Thin inelastic fabric.
      - Armpit width: 55 cm.
      - Length: 80.5 cm.
      - Sleeve length (from collar): 70.5 cm.
      - The parameters are specified for size: S / M.

      Sleeve: long
      Casual: casual
      Composition: 5% Cotton, 95% Polyester
